titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to retire all land-based intercontinental ballistic missiles before October 1, 1997.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Defense to retire all land-based intercontinental ballistic missiles before October 1, 1997.
